channel.title: 3D Games on MiniGameFun
channel.description: Recent content in 3D Games on MiniGameFun

item.title: Animals Mix Up AI Hybrid
item.description:
Discover unique combinations of animals and everyday things in this exciting game! Just pick two animals, and the AI will use a special algorithm to blend them together.

Instructions

Mouse click or tap to play

item.title: Bank Robbery Puzzle Shooter
item.description:
This game is about moving character from one given point to other point to reach the money counter to collect the cash to increase the score. While moving from one point to other there would be chance of defending from obstacle.

Instructions

Mouse click or tap to play

item.title: Bus Simulator 3D Bus Coach
item.description:
Start to Bus Simulator - 3D Bus Coach, where you&rsquo;re into the driver position to drive on city streets and off-road adventures, picking up and dropping off passengers safely as you master real bus driving skills. Whether you&rsquo;re navigating busy streets or steering through tricky off-road routes, you&rsquo;re set for an exciting drive in this realistic bus driving game!

Instructions

Mouse click or tap to play

item.title: Candy Balls
item.description:
Everyone wants to relax after the a hectic pace of a work day, and this game knows how to help with that, Simple actions, fresh and cool design, a wide variety of tasks - this game has plenty of levels so you can have lots of fun while playing game.

Instructions

Mouse click or tap to play

item.title: Carve Cookie, Candy
item.description:
Carve Cookie Candy is a special game for cookies shape. multiple cookie handle puzzle game. Best game of real time game play. different levels with new experience.

Instructions

Mouse click or tap to play

item.title: Chill Math Multiplication
item.description:
In this game, a winter image is hidden beneath multiplication expression tiles. Players must drag and drop the correct number bauble onto the matching tiles to solve the expressions. As each expression is solved, the winter image gradually gets revealed. The goal is to uncover the entire image by completing all the math problems correctly.

Instructions

Use a mouse or touchpad to drag and drop the correct number bauble onto the matching tiles to solve the expressions

item.title: Cube Tower Stack 3D
item.description:
In this causal game we are providing 9 New characters and you can play the game by collecting coins while moving character building stacks, super fun entertainment game. When you reaching the end of the level you do come across with 7 number of steps to double, multiple your coins. c

Instructions

Mouse click or tap to play

item.title: Cut the Grass Cutting Grass
item.description:
Cutting Grass by moving lawn mower is very interesting game to play in control. Here you have different crops to experience and different lawn mower to play. On every level you are going to see different crop field shapes like you feel real crop.

Instructions

Mouse click or tap to play

item.title: Danboard Adventure
item.description:
Embark on a heartwarming journey with Danboard Adventure, a game filled with story-driven puzzles and fun adventures. As you guide Danboard through exciting challenges, you&rsquo;ll make crucial choices that shape the journeys outcome. Each choice leads to a different adventure! At first, Danboard was fishing when he noticed that his boat was on top of a whale.

Instructions

Mouse click or tap to play

item.title: Feeding Fun
item.description:
Feeding Fun is an electrifying puzzle game that challenges players to connect circuits and light up bulbs using limited moves. Set in a futuristic neon world, players must strategically connect energy sources to light up all the bulbs on each level. With increasingly complex puzzles, Feeding Fun offers hours of brain-teasing fun, testing your logic and problem-solving skills.

Instructions

Objective Connect all the kids and foods Controls Tap and drag to connect the kids and foods Ensure all kids are connected before running out of moves

item.title: Food Slicer Food Cutting Game
item.description:
Looking for a new veggie slice &amp; fruit slice game? Love the thrill of chop-chop and slice it challenges? Well, you are sure to adore the new Food Slicer game. Show great chef skills and Whether you need to cut bread, cut vegetables, cut fruits, showcase great reaction, cutting precision, and avoid hitting the wood deck! Can you complete all chopping food levels? Start your quest to slice perfect slices NOW!

Instructions

Mouse click or tap to play

item.title: Fruits Juice Runner
item.description:
Collecting all fruits and coins while moving glass gives you more excitement of game play. it is very easy level of play and more fun! 1. Please move glass left and right with finger touch on screen 2. Collect same color fruits and avoid different color fruits 3. If the size of the glass as its begin them level is fail 4. If you collect the more number of same color fruits then you can share the juice to people at level end.

Instructions

Mouse click or tap to play

item.title: Here Your Pizza
item.description:
Step into the world of fast-paced pizzeria management Game where your task is to hire employees, serve customers through drive-thru windows, and keep the orders coming at the counter.

Instructions

Mouse click or tap to play

item.title: Hexa Stack Sort
item.description:
Hexa Stack Sort is a fun and engaging puzzle game that will put your brain to the test! The goal is simple, but the challenge is exciting. You need to match and stack hexagonal blocks of the same color. You can move the blocks around. but be careful not to get stuck. Only blocks of the same color can be stacked together.

Instructions

Mouse click or tap to play

item.title: Indian Wedding: DressUp Makeup
item.description:
Bridal always wants to try with different styles before really goes to apply marriage suits. This game would have that great option to check all bridal accessories to the photo. In this game you can try all Indian Wedding Dress up styles and Fashion style too. Kids also can enjoy by applying Princess Dress up accessories

Instructions

Mouse click or tap to play

item.title: Number Run 3D Casual Game
item.description:
Number Run 3D is a thrilling casual game that challenges your skills and reflexes as you navigate through a world filled with exciting obstacles.

Instructions

Mouse click or tap to play

item.title: Renovation!
item.description:
You need to control workers, first move furniture into messy houses, and then sell them for money. Use the money you earn to build a brand new house!

Instructions

Mouse click or tap to play

item.title: Rescue Skibd Rope Cut Puzzle
item.description:
The most fun and simple game in the world, you can happily on every level. Help the man by cutting the thread right place. Can he avoid the pinch of desperate life, enjoy playing every level. It all depends on you!

Instructions

Mouse click or tap to play

item.title: Tabla Drum Kit Music
item.description:
Are you a music enthusiast who loves playing drums? Do you want to become a drum master? Then, Tabla Drum Kit Music is the app for you! This app lets you learn drums, practice, and play with realistic sound and touch on your phone or tablet. Whether youre a beginner or an advanced drummer, you can use this app to improve your skills and become a drum master.

Instructions

Mouse click or tap to play

item.title: Truck Parking Game
item.description:
Game Play: Use arrows for moving truck: To Front: Press Up Arrow to move forward the truck To Back: Press T to shift the gear to reverse and press Up Arrow To left : Left Arrow To Right: Right Arrow Cargo truck parking games 2025 suits you perfectly. This heavy truck parking simulator 2025 is the ultimate simulation &amp; truck parking game with highest graphics ever! If you think that you have all those pro skills of the best driver, then you can enjoy the game must.

Instructions

Mouse click or tap to play
